## How to Test
Steps to verify (monorepo):
1. `yarn install`
2. Run form-builder-basic: `yarn dev` (http://localhost:3000)
3. Build library: `yarn workspace form-builder build`
4. Optional tests: `yarn workspace form-builder test`
